text: (Visvasigale,) andu nivu (badr maidanada) ondu koneyalliddare, avaru (satru pade) innondu koneyalliddaru mattu vyapara tandavu nimaginta taggu pradesadallittu. Ondu vele nivu (mukhamukhige) kala niscayisalu horatiddare niscita kalada kuritu bhinnate taluttiddiri. Adare nasavaguvavanu spasta puraveyondige nasavagabeku mattu baduki uliyuvavanu spasta puraveyondige baduki uliyabekemba tanna nirdharavannu allahanu sadhisi torisa bayasiddanu. Allahanantu khanditavagiyu ellavannu keluvavanu mattu ariyuvavanagiddane
